Problem in the level just after 'one year later' video..when u get into the hanger in front of the cockpit, the moment the soldier sees u and activates the alarm, there is no way to get out of the hanger..it gets into an endless loop of killing the next soldier that comes in through the red-light lit door on the left side of the alarm.
